metadata.description: App store compliance checker plugins for iOS, Android, Chrome, and Firefox. Scan your apps and extensions for rejection risks before submission.

plugins.name: claude-ios-gatekeeper
plugins.description: Scan iOS apps for Apple App Store rejection risks. Supports native Swift/Obj-C, React Native, Expo, Flutter, Capacitor, Cordova, Unity, and .NET MAUI.

plugins.name: claude-android-gatekeeper
plugins.description: Scan Android apps for Google Play Store rejection risks. Supports native Kotlin/Java, React Native, Expo, Flutter, Capacitor, Cordova, Unity, and .NET MAUI.

plugins.name: claude-chrome-gatekeeper
plugins.description: Scan Chrome extensions for Chrome Web Store rejection risks. Supports Plasmo, WXT, CRXJS/Vite, vanilla JS, and framework-based extensions.

plugins.name: claude-firefox-gatekeeper
plugins.description: Scan Firefox extensions for Mozilla Add-ons (AMO) rejection risks. Supports Plasmo, WXT, CRXJS/Vite, vanilla JS, and framework-based extensions. Updated for November 2025 data collection requirements.
